pages.text: Finding MIDI Files online is fairly easy and you can find thousands of free MIDI files in just a few minutes.$(br2)Often MIDI files that are free are for older songs or video games, but you can also sometimes find free MIDI files for modern songs as well.

pages.title: Websites
pages.text: Some good places to search for free MIDI files include:$(br)$(li)$(l:https://bitmidi.com/)bitmidi.com$()$(li)$(l:http://www.vanbasco.com/midisearch.html)vanbasco.com$()$(li)$(l:https://freemidi.org/)freemidi.org$()$(li)$(l:https://www.midiworld.com/files/)midiworld.com$()$(br2)You can also just try Google!
